network

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Network

  • public class Network
extends java.lang.Object
    Managment class for networking
    Author:
    jafi2

      • createServer

        public static Network createServer(int port)
        creates a server
        Parameters:
        port - the port of the server
        Returns:
        the Network object for interacting with the network

                                      int port)
        Connects to an existing server
        Parameters:
        address - ip adress of the server
        port - port of the server

      • renderNetObjects

        public void renderNetObjects()
        Renders all network Objects, should be called once per frame

      • updateNetObjects

        public void updateNetObjects(double deltaTime)
        Updates all network Objects, should be called once per frame on the server.
        Clients are not allowed to call this method
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - time since last update

      • registerNetObject

        public void registerNetObject(NetObject obj)
        Called by the server in order to add a netObject
        Clients are not allowed to call this method
        Parameters:
        obj - the netObject to add

      • registerNetPlayer

        public void registerNetPlayer(NetPlayer obj)
        Called by the server in order to add a netPlayer
        Clients are not allowed to call this method
        Parameters:
        obj - the netPlayer to add

        obj - the netObject to add

        Adds loaded netPlayer to netPlayer list

      • getKeyStates

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getKeyStates(int playerID)
        Returns a HashMap with all known states of keyboard keys for the given player
        Clients may not call this method
        Method must not be called with the local player's id
        Parameters:
        playerID - the id of the player
        Returns:
        the HashMap use GLFW.GLFW_KEY_keyname as key to get GLFW key state

      • getMousePosition

        public Vector getMousePosition(int playerID)
        Returns the last reported mouse position for the given player
        Clients may not call this method
        Method must not be called with the local player's id
        Parameters:
        playerID - the id of the player
        Returns:
        the position of the mouse

      • genPlayerID

        public int genPlayerID()
        Generates a new player ID

        the playerID
